title: Google Docs will soon let you add emoji reactions to documents
content:
Emoji reactions are an integral part of Slack, Instagram, and iMessage conversations, allowing you to quickly react to messages without putting much effort. Now Google Docs is joining the party. Google Docs on the web will soon let you leave emoji reactions in documents. Google Docs currently lets you add a comment to documents, which,

The post Google Docs will soon let you add emoji reactions to documents appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google Docs on the web will soon let you leave quick emoji reactions in documents. Read on to know more.
